Row.Text: +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:HOMELAND] Homelands Treasure Resources. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District in the Homelands.

The Legend of the Toad King
